data.text: Yad binɨb takaw yɨbɨl keke apal tek ayɨp, ensel takaw apal tek agenɨm ak pen, binɨb kɨlop mapen ma lenɨm, yad anɨb ak tek mɨdebin. Akɨl yokɨp yokɨp nep pugɨpal, mab pɨdɨm yokɨp yokɨp nep pakɨpal tek mɨdebin.

13.2 Mat 17.20, 21.21, Mak 11.23, Luk 17.6, 1 Ko 12.8-10, 12.28 Pen yad bɨ God gos ñek agñeb olap mɨdɨl, God gos ne we gak ak mɨdupsek nɨgtep gɨl, gos tɨpagɨl ke yɨbɨl nɨŋɨd, Klays nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, dum ogɨnap agen ke okok amonɨmuŋ ak pen, binɨb kɨlop mapen ma lenɨm, tap yokɨp yɨbɨl tek mɨdebin.

13.3 Mat 6.2 Tap yad mɨdupsek mɨdeb tek, bɨlok binɨb tap ma mɨdeb okok kɨlop ñenɨm, pen yad nɨŋɨd kelɨgenɨm bɨ yɨp apɨl chɨchɨk dɨl, mab yɨnub nab ak dɨyokel kumnɨgayn13.3 Glik takaw mɨj nedil tɨkɨlak okok, takaw anɨb ak mɨdupsek takaw nokom jɨmñɨl ma tɨkɨlak. Ogɨnap takaw tɨkɨl anɨb agɨlak, Bɨ yɨp apɨl chɨchɨk dɨl, mab yɨnub nab ak dɨyokel kumnɨgayn agɨl tɨkak. Ogɨnap pen tɨkɨl anɨb agɨlak, Bɨ yɨp apɨl chɨchɨk del, yad yɨb awl yɨbɨl dɨnɨgayn agɨl tɨkɨlak. ak pen, binɨb kɨlop mapen ma lenɨm, tap genɨm anɨb okok yɨp gek mɨdtep gɨnɨm tek ma lɨnɨgab.

Bɨ ak binɨb kɨlop mapen lup ak, ne anɨgɨl gup. Binɨb okok kɨlop yɨlɨk ma nɨŋɨd kabɨyam ma juwɨl, mapen nɨŋɨd dɨtep gup. Binɨb okok tap tep del, kɨlop mɨlɨk ma nɨgup. Yad yɨb awl mɨdebin agɨl gos ma nɨŋɨd, yɨb ne ke dad ma aplanub.
13.5 1 Ko 10.24, Plp 2.4 Ne ke tap ak tap ak gɨlɨg suk awl ma gup. Tap ne okok nep gos ma nɨgup. Mɨlɨk kasek ma nɨgup. Binɨb okok nop gɨ tɨmel gel, gos anɨb ak nɨgɨlɨg ma mɨdeb.
13.6 Sng 10.3, Lom 1.32, 12.9, 2 Jo 4 Binɨb tap tɨmel gɨpal ak, nɨgek nop tep ma gup ak pen, kɨli tap gɨtep gɨpal ak nɨgek, nop tep gup.

13.7 Lom 15.1, 1 Ko 9.12, Gal 6.2, 2 Ti 2.24, 1 Pi 4.8 Tap tɨmel okok nop gek ma apyap pakup. Pel Klays nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, mɨdtep gɨnɨgayn agɨl gos sek kod mɨdɨl, mɨŋel tɨtay apek, pel kɨles gɨl jak mɨdeb.

Binɨb kɨlop mapen lep anɨb ak, pel pelnep yenɨgab. Pen God binɨb gos ñek agñeb wog ak amek gɨjunɨgab. Kɨlop kɨles ñek takaw yɨbɨl keke apal ak amek gɨjunɨgab. Kɨlop kɨles ñek gos nɨgtep gep ak amek kul gɨjunɨgab.
Ak tek ak chɨn mɨñɨl gos sɨkol sɨkol nep nɨg mɨdobun, God chɨnop gos ñek agñɨbun ak gos ne sɨkol sɨkol nep nɨg mɨdobun.
Kɨdek pen, okok mɨdupsek teplep yɨbɨl mɨdeb ñɨn ak ownɨgab ak, tap dayday mɨdeb okok mɨdupsek gɨjunɨgab.

Yad ñɨsɨkol yelɨgɨpin ñɨn ak, yad ñɨsɨkol takaw ak agɨl, ñɨsɨkol gos ak nɨŋɨd, ñɨsɨkol tap tɨtay dɨl mɨdeb ak agɨl gos ak nɨŋɨd gelɨgɨpin. Pen awl gɨl bɨ mɨdebin ñɨn ak, ñɨsɨkol gos nɨŋɨd gɨpal anɨb ak kelɨgɨpin.

13.12 Mat 18.10, 2 Ko 3.18, 5.7, Plp 3.12, Jem 1.23, 1 Jo 3.2 Mɨñɨl God tap ne wɨdɨn nopun okok, nɨgtep ma gɨl, ñɨg kawnan pag nepal tek ak nopun ak pen, kɨdek God nop jomulɨk ak penpen nɨgɨnɨgabun. Mɨñɨl God tap ne gos nopun okok, dayday tek nopun ak pen, kɨdek God chɨnop mɨñɨl nɨgtep gup tek, nop nɨgtep gɨnɨgabun.
Ak pen tap omɨŋal nokom anɨb okok mɨdeb. Klays nop gos lɨnɨgep ak, God nop gos sek kod mɨdep ak, binɨb okok kɨlop mapen lep ak. Pen tap awl yɨbɨl ak nɨm, binɨb okok kɨlop mapen lep ak.
